review: Dr Dwivedi has strong clarity on patient management, and provides support and guidance in making decisions. His expertise in cardiac issues is strong *** *** ***** ** **********

I met him and the consultation experience was wonderful with the doctor. He listens to the patients very carefully that's very good and then he provides the suggestions apart from medicines he suggested to me to change my lifestyle because I'm having difficulty in breathing and actually having panic attacks so he suggested a few tips which really helped, he was really very good while explaining the issues. He is perfect, nothing to improve with him. More than a year I have been consulting him. He is fantastic. Actually, I went through practo there was no waiting. In fact he was waiting for me, I was delayed that way he is wonderful.

I had visited the hospital and it was health problem. ****** *** ****. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. I am satisfied with the treatment and consultation . I had chest pain, I had clot. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. Injection was for one week. Every 6 months we use to do 2D echo test. There was no waiting time in the hospital. I am good now. Diet was suggested as my cholesterol was high. Hospitality was good. He explained well. If any concerns he will refer other doctor.

I had consulted this doctor in january and it was for cardiac issue. Doctor was fine. I went for second opinion. I got treated in ramaya hospital and my urologist suggested to visited for second opinion . I am satisfied with the consultation given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. There was no waiting time when I went. Now i am fine. Hospitality was good.

I had been to hospital in may month and it was for my father. He had heart related issue. I had the consultation with this Doctor he was good. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor.  Scanning and blood test was done in hospital.  I am satisfied with the treatment given.   I can recommend this Doctor to my family or friends. Appointment Fees and hospital charges was costly. There was no waiting time when I went. He is fine now .

** ** * **** ******* I would like to recommend the doctor to my family and friends. Happy with the explanation of health issue given by the doctor. ** ** ***** ** **** ** *** ****** ********** he wasn’t giving me medicines prior or any examination ** ** *** ***** He did give time for the consultation and said to do a test then later suggested the treatment, medicines and what to do and all. I was completely satisfied with the treatment and consultation of the doctor. He was very comfortable and friendly.
Approachable and professional attitude. Got appropriate answers for my queries. **** ***************
